subject: adobe dreamweaver cs3 $59
body:
One of the surest signs of the Philistine is his reverence for the superior tastes of those who put him down.

Bear patiently with a rival.

Insanity is often the logic of an accurate mind overtasked.

Goodness is achieved not in a vacuum, but in the company of other men, attended by love.

Business leaders often get credit for the successful decisions that were forced on them.

Many a time I have wanted to stop talking and find out what I really believed.

I met a hundred men going to Delhi and everyone is my brother.

Conversation would be vastly improved by the constant use of four simple words: I do not know.

He is a king who fears nothing, he is a king who desires nothing!

A god who let us prove his existence would be an idol.

What you do not want others to do to you, do not do to others.

Fortune is like glass--the brighter the glitter, the more easily broken.

A great deal of talent is lost in the world for want of courage.
